alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 24 at 2:43PM MST until February 27 at 1:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Feet, Eastern Las Animas County, and Baca County. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
